BaldPhone %s was not found! a About Hi
My name is Uriah Shaul Mandel, and i'm the developer of this platform.
I live in Tel Aviv.
Iv'e spent a lot of time and effort to make this platform, and released it for free, for everyone to use
you are more than welcome to contact me, by email.
baldphone.contact@gmail.com Accessibility Level Accessibility Accidental Touch Guard The guard blocks your phone from touch input when the phone is covered
if you have problems with it you can turn it off Accidental touch was detected
press OK to continue using the phone
if this message keeps appearing you can disable it in the accessibility settings Acknowledgments Ad Adaptive Add Alarm Add Timer Add Contact Add Add Pill Add Shortcut Add to Favorite Add to Home Add to SOS Address Advanced Options Afternoon Airplane Mode Alarm Name Alarm Volume Choose Volume for Alarms.
Volume increases from left to right. Alarms Alarm repeats every All Alarms All Pills Allow Already Setted!
Click here to change to it An error has occurred! and welcome to Baldphone ANIMATION_TAG Api Level: App Version Name: App Version Number: Apps Are you sure you want to call Magen David Adom? Are you sure you want to delete %s? Arrows Arrows for scrolling Choose whether you want to scroll with: 
1.arrows (recommended if hands are shaking)
2.regular swiping Assistant At least one day must be selected! Auto
Brightness back backspace Please allow the following permissions: BaldPhone Updated Blocked Bluetooth Brightness Change Brightness. Cache Cleared Successfully! Calculator Call Calling
Call Log: This permission is required in order to call contacts. Calling %s Camera This permission is required in order to turn on the flashlight. Cancel Change Pills Time Change System Settings Please allow BaldPhone to change settings, such as increasing the font size and changing the brightness. Fri Mon Sat Sun Thu Tue Wed Clear Clear Cache Clear All Data Are you sure you want to delete all data? 100%? 1000000% sure?
pressing yes will delete all data! Clicked! Clock Coming Soon! Connection Contact must has a Name! Contact not created! Contacts This permission is required in order to read contacts. This permission is required in order to add new contacts. Oops!
BaldPhone ran into a problem and will now restart. Current Time Custom Dark Delete Delete %s? Delete all alarms Delete all pills Details Dialer Display Do you want to add %s to your contacts? Done Down Edit Email: Enable Notification Access Please give BaldPhone access to notification. Enter Enter contact name: Evening Example Example of different text sizes
Should be readable and not to overflow. This permission is required in order to save pictures. Favorites Send Feedback Feedback cannot be empty! Feedback sent successfully! Please select the level of accessibility Font Choose font size for the entire phone.
May need to restart device to see changes Friday Tutorial Google Have hard time using the phone's keyboard? use Baldphone's BIG keyboard instead 0 Hello Video Tutorial Hide High Level Home Home phone number Hour How can I help? Huge In ? days Internet Invoked in: One last thing
It's highly recommended to use Baldphone's home screen as the default home launcher language Language Large Hi
BaldPhone was updated.
pills now work differently.
all of your pills were removed, you can add them again in the pills page.
 sorry for the inconvenient Left Left Handed Light Location Long Presses Choose if you want to use long presses or regular ones.\Long presses are recommended if hands are shaking.
When choosing long presses Vibration Feedback and Arrows Swiping should be on too. Magen David Adom Mail Manual Maps
Medium Medium Level Message Messages Minute Minutes Missed Mobile
Mobile phone number Monday more Morning Name named new alarm %s was created! Next NFC No no contact contain %s! not a real time! Notes Notes Choose if you want to have a Note page in the home screen. Notifications
of Off OK On
Only once
Open Opening %s
Outgoing Page//page 1 of 2 Page Transitions Permissions Personalization Phone Please go to settings -> permissions -> enable call permission Photo Photos Pill added! Pill Name Pills Pin Contact To Home Screen please allow BaldPhone to change Phone Settings! Couldn't understand, please repeat. Press Longer! Press me and start talking Preview Previous Timer Read Call History This permission is required in order to view the call history. Read contacts Received Recent Regular level Regular Presses Regular Swiping Remind Me
Reminder reminds every Remove from Favorite Remove from Home Remove from SOS Remove shortcut Removed all alarms! Every day Right Right Handed
Ringtone Saturday save Selected Send Set Default Calling App BaldPhone needs to be marked as the default calling app. Set Home Screen In order to use BaldPhone, you should set it as home screen.
It is reversible and can be changed in the settings. Set keyboard Setting Does Not Exist Settings Settings Permission Share Hi, i'm using this platform named "BaldPhone" which replaces the phone's interface to a big, simple and friendlier one.
Interested?
You can download it for free!
check out the links bellow:

Website:
https://sites.google.com/view/baldphone/home

Download link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bald.uriah.baldphone Hello There,
know anyone which may want to know about BaldPhone?
you can share it with him. Share BaldPhone Share Contact Share Via Other App Share Via Whatsapp shift should contain one ":" Show Small Snooze SOS SOS is full! SOS is full! please remove other sos contacts before adding another one Speak Speech to Text Strong Hand choose your strong hand.
will change layout according to it submit Sunday Teal Technical Information Theme Choose a theme
Thursday Pills Time Changer Tiny to %d days and %d hours from now to %d hours and %d minutes from now to %d minutes from now Today too many apps with %s in them! too many contacts with %s in them! Took! Tuesday Unable to initialize flashlight! Uninstall Are you sure you want to uninstall %s?
%s's data will be gone forever! Up Vibrating Feedback Choose if you want to get a short viberation feedback after every click
recommended when using long presses! Video Video Tutorials Videos
Voice Mail Wednesday Whatsapp Wifi will repeat only once! Work Write Write Contacts Write external storage Yes Yesterday Entering BaldPhone Exiting BaldPhone Nothing No Contacts Found! No Alarms
Create one by clicking
"Add Alarm"
Or
"Add Timer" No Pills
Create one by clicking
"Add Pill" Clear All Notifications Are you sure you want to delete all cache?
Apps shortcuts will be removed too! Hi, BaldPhone must have the following permissions in order to run. some of them sound scary, but it is the only way BaldPhone can replace the phone's interface. No data is taken and it causes no harm. press OK to grant the permissions or no to exit BaldPhone. Also available at
baldphone.contact@gmail.com Following Google's new privacy policy change, sadly, Recent Calls has to be removed.
I'm sure this is a mistake and hopefully google will change their decision in the future. Pending Update Download Install Updates This Permission is required in order to update BaldPhone A new update is available!
Updates are important to keep BaldPhone running smoothly.
Press OK to download Current Version:
 New Version:
 New updates are ready to be downloaded Install Data Warning Hi, you're not connected to WIFI.
The size of the download approximately 3MB, if you're abroad it may cost you money.
Do you want to continue with the download? Update message is corrupted Check for updates Could not connect to server! Could not connect to internet! Could not start the download! Downloaded update file could not be deleted! Downloadingâ€¦ BaldPhone is up to date What's new
